title: Kan Pesum Vaarthaigal Lyrics 7G Rainbow Colony
stanzas:
Kan Pesum Vaarthaigal Lyrics 7g Rainbow Colony
Singer: Karthik 
Lyrics Na Muthukumar 

Kan pesum 
Vaarthaigal purivadhilai
Kaathirundha
Pen kanivadhillai.

Oru mugam 
Maraindhaal 
Maru mugam theriya
Kannaadi idhayamillai..
Kadal kai moodi
Maraivadhillai ...

Kaayam nooru
Kanda piragum
Unnai ull manam
Marappadhillai.

Oru muraithaan
Pen paarpathinaal
Varugira vali 
Aval arivadhillai

Kanavinilum dhinam
Ninaivinilum karaigira
Naan manam 
Purivadhillai.

Kan pesum
Vaarthaigal ..

Kaattile kaayum nilavai
Kandu kolla yarumillai
Kangalin anumadhi
Vaangi kadhalum
Ingae varuvadhillai.

Dhoorathil
Theriyum velichcham
Paadhaiku sondhamillai
Minnalin oliyai
Pudikkala minmini
Poochikku theriyavillai.

Vizhi unaku sondhamadi
Vedhanaigal
Enaku sondhamadi

Alai karaiyai
Kadandha pinne
Nuraigal mattum
Karaikke sondhamadi..

Kan pesum
Vaarthaigal ..

Ulagathil eththanai
Pennulladhu
Manam oruthiyayi
Mattum kondadudhu

Oru murai
Vazhndhida thindaadudhu
Iru uyir varai 
Paaindhu kondadudhu.

Pani thuli vandhu
Modhiyadhaal
Mullum ingae 
Thundaanadhu ..

Boomiyil Ulla
Poigaellaam ada
Pudavai katti
Pennaanadhu ..

Puyal adiththaal
Maram irukkum 
Malargalum pookkalum
Maraindhu vidum..

Sirippu varum
Azhugai varum
Kadhalil irandume
Kalandhu varum ..

Oru muraithaan
Pen paarpathinaal
Varugira vali 
Aval arivadhillai

Kanavinilum dhinam
Ninaivinilum karaigira
Naan manam 
Purivadhillai.

Kan pesum
Vaarthaigal ..

Kaattile ilaigal
Parandha piragum
Kilayin thalumbugal
Alivadhillai

Kaayam nooru
Kanda piragum
Unnai ull manam
Marappadhillai.
